title: Launcher won't open - only in Task Manager
body:
Latest patch has stopped my client from opening in the foreground. Logo pops up but nothing else. Task Manager has Lol_Launcher, 2 instances of Lol_patcher and 2 instances of Lol_patcher_ux but no client window pops up. Tried every fix mentioned all over the web including reinstalling, deleting LoL Launcher folder, RADS folder contents, resolution, winsock, you name it, I have tried it. No idea what has stopped it from opening. 

The only other new things in that time was Plays.tv installing via Raptr (also tried uninstalling that) and an updated graphics driver which I have also rolled back with no success.

Short of reinstalling Windows, I am running low on ideas...anyone else?

replies.body: Just paused protection on Kaspersky and the lanucher opened and is now patching. Super weird considering the application is fully trusted and I have never had the issue before...

Sounds like Kaspersky was potentially scanning the league files while the application was trying to launch, could also be a detection (Obviously a false one), but I doubt that.

Have you tried adding an exception to your AV for the league directory? If not, please do this to hopefully prevent the issue in the future.
